/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings and the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The street is lined with trees and lampposts, adding a touch of greenery to the urban landscape. People can be seen walking on the sidewalks, going about their day. Cars are driving on the road, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static cityscape. The image beautifully encapsulates the blend of nature and urban life in Beijing.
